content.title: Recover IBC Expired Client from Stargaze
content.description: This proposal aims to recover the expired client 07-tendermint-6 belonging to the ICS20 Stargaze connection and update with the new client 07-tendermint-42. Similar proposal has been submited to Stargaze governance.

title: Recover IBC Expired Client from Stargaze
summary: This proposal aims to recover the expired client 07-tendermint-6 belonging to the ICS20 Stargaze connection and update with the new client 07-tendermint-42. Similar proposal has been submited to Stargaze governance.
